column5: Hi guys  Getting the boat out this week and I need a couple of the "sleeper" type fold out seats. Can't find much on the NET in the Kitchener /Toronto area. Anyone know where to go?\\Thanks  Speed
Hi ya Rob. Long time bud. Hope alls well with everyone. You might want to try Sandycove Marine. I seen some up in thier flea market level there last fall. Cheers

Hi Brian  Good to hear from you.  That is a bit far for me. I was hoping to hear of some place in the KWor Toronto area. Seems funny but i have search the internet and have not found very much close by. We're hanging in here. The little guy is having a real rough go right now. Hope all is well with you.  TTYS. Speed
www.wholesalemarine.com   might want to look at this site....some pretty decent deals...if ya dont mind waiting for them  good luck

i got mine online at overtons...  we ordered 3 of them ( 1 for me, and 2 for my co-worker...), worked out to $200 after everything was all said and done...  http://www.overtons.com/modperl/product/.....wse&aID=11A  10% off online orders aswell...
check your CTC and Walmart as I have seen them at both out near me...
